attributes.action: Afford public-sector 'workers' opportunity to freeze or upgrade contributions to fund shortfall
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Numerous media-reports indicate a huge black-hole between contributions & liabilities; actuaries looking for a 5+ fold increase.

Taxpayer already looking at unaffordable hikes in PAYE.

General-population also need to fund the 'welfare-bucket' TODAY given taxation decades-ahead is an unknown.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
